title: Google\Cloud\OrgPolicy\V2\AlternatePolicySpec
name: AlternatePolicySpec
description:
Similar to PolicySpec but with an extra 'launch' field for launch reference.

The PolicySpec here is specific for dry-run/darklaunch.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.orgpolicy.v2.AlternatePolicySpec

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.launch
params.description: Reference to the launch that will be used while audit logging and to control the launch. Should be set only in the alternate policy.

params.name: data.spec
params.description: Specify Constraint for configurations of Cloud Platform resources.

methods.name: getLaunch
methods.description:

Should be set only in the alternate policy.
